level.heading: PETITION FORM FOR INDEPENDENT CANDIDATES AND CANDIDATES FOR ELECTION TO THEON-PARTISAN OFFICES OF MEMBER OF THE BOARD OF EDUCATION AND ADVISORYEIGHBORHOOD COMMISSIONER (ยง 3-1602)

level.text: The front of each page of the petition shall contain the name, address, registration number (if any) of the candidate, ward, school district or single-member district (where applicable), and the office to which the candidate seeks election.
The front page of the petition shall state that any registered voter may sign the petition, regardless of party affiliation.

Petitions for candidates for election from a ward, school district or single- member district shall further state that only residents of the ward, school district or single-member district (whichever is applicable) from which the candidate seeks election may sign the petition.
The back of each page of the petition shall contain the following:
The name and address (telephone number optional) of the person circulating the petition;
The affidavit of the circulator required by this chapter; and
A statement to inform the circulator of the penalties for conviction of providing false information in the required affidavit of circulator.
No nominating petition form shall be issued by the Board until the information required pursuant to ยง 1602.1 has been placed in all appropriate spaces on the petition form.
